## sha1() function

获取给定值的 sha1 哈希。

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function sha1(value: BinaryLike): string;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | BinaryLike | 给定值 |

<b>Returns:</b>
